alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 01 at 7:02PM CST until March 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN SOUTH PLAINS... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED... A Fire Weather Watch remains in effect from Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. The Red Flag Warning is no longer in effect. * Timing...Thursday from 10 AM to 6 PM CST. * Wind...Southwest to west at 25 to 30 mph and gusts to 50 mph. * Humidity...15 to 20 percent. * Fuels...Dry to Critically dry. * Impacts...Any fires that develop can spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
